forloop incrementing i from 0.description: Make a for loop with i from 0 to n-1

forloop incrementing i from 1.description: Make a for loop with i from 1 to n

forloop decrementing i.description: Make a for loop with i from n-1 to 0

forloop incrementing j from 0.description: Make a for loop with j from 0 to n-1

forloop incrementing j from 1.description: Make a for loop with j from 1 to n

forloop decrementing j.description: Make a for loop with j from n-1 to 0
